description: Returns selection metadata and a document in JSON format that specifies a list of resources that are associated with a backup plan.

parameters.name: SelectionId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies the body of a request to assign a set of resources to a backup plan.

nested_items.name: BackupSelection
nested_items.description: Specifies the body of a request to assign a set of resources to a backup plan.

nested_items.name: SelectionName
nested_items.description: The display name of a resource selection document. Must contain 1 to 50 alphanumeric or ---_.' characters.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that Backup uses to authenticate when backing up the target resource; for example, arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/S3Access.

nested_items.name: Resources
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the resources to assign to a backup plan. The maximum number of ARNs is 500 without wildcards, or 30 ARNs with wildcards.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ListOfTags
nested_items.description: The conditions that you define to assign resources to your backup plans using tags. For example, "StringEquals": { "ConditionKey": "backup", "ConditionValue": "daily"}.

nested_items.name: ConditionType
nested_items.description: An operation applied to a key-value pair used to assign resources to your backup plan. Condition only supports StringEquals. For more flexible assignment options, including StringLike and the ability to exclude resources from your backup plan, use Conditions (with an 's' on the end) for your BackupSelection.

nested_items.name: ConditionKey
nested_items.description: The key in a key-value pair. For example, in the tag Department: Accounting, Department is the key.

nested_items.name: ConditionValue
nested_items.description: The value in a key-value pair. For example, in the tag Department: Accounting, Accounting is the value.

nested_items.name: NotResources
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the resources to exclude from a backup plan. The maximum number of ARNs is 500 without wildcards, or 30 ARNs with wildcards.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Conditions
nested_items.description: The conditions that you define to assign resources to your backup plans using tags. For example, "StringEquals": { "ConditionKey": "aws:ResourceTag/backup", "ConditionValue": "daily" }.

nested_items.name: StringEquals
nested_items.description: Filters the values of your tagged resources for only those resources that you tagged with the same value. Also called 'exact matching.'

nested_items.name: ConditionKey
nested_items.description: The key in a key-value pair. For example, in the tag Department: Accounting, Department is the key.

nested_items.name: ConditionValue
nested_items.description: The value in a key-value pair. For example, in the tag Department: Accounting, Accounting is the value.

nested_items.name: StringNotEquals
nested_items.description: Filters the values of your tagged resources for only those resources that you tagged that do not have the same value. Also called 'negated matching.'

nested_items.name: ConditionKey
nested_items.description: The key in a key-value pair. For example, in the tag Department: Accounting, Department is the key.

nested_items.name: ConditionValue
nested_items.description: The value in a key-value pair. For example, in the tag Department: Accounting, Accounting is the value.

nested_items.name: StringLike
nested_items.description: Filters the values of your tagged resources for matching tag values with the use of a wildcard character (*) anywhere in the string. For example, 'prod*' or 'rod' matches the tag value 'production'.

nested_items.name: ConditionKey
nested_items.description: The key in a key-value pair. For example, in the tag Department: Accounting, Department is the key.

nested_items.name: ConditionValue
nested_items.description: The value in a key-value pair. For example, in the tag Department: Accounting, Accounting is the value.

nested_items.name: StringNotLike
nested_items.description: Filters the values of your tagged resources for non-matching tag values with the use of a wildcard character (*) anywhere in the string.

nested_items.name: ConditionKey
nested_items.description: The key in a key-value pair. For example, in the tag Department: Accounting, Department is the key.

nested_items.name: ConditionValue
nested_items.description: The value in a key-value pair. For example, in the tag Department: Accounting, Accounting is the value.

nested_items.name: SelectionId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies the body of a request to assign a set of resources to a backup plan.

nested_items.name: BackupPlanId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies a backup plan.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time a backup selection is created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: CreatorRequestId
nested_items.description: A unique string that identifies the request and allows failed requests to be retried without the risk of running the operation twice.
